mdRecord.dcterms:title: Frederick Mitchell Mooers House, exterior
Wright-Mooers House
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Frederick Mitchell Mooers House is named after the wealthy gold miner who owned the house from 1898 to 1900. The architect is unknown. The house sits with other Victorian houses in the South Bonnie Brae Tract Historic District in Los Angeles. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_Mitchell_Mooers_House [work]
